mapper.select: SELECT c.activity_id,c.activity_title,c.activity_image,c.activity_owner_id FROM sy_goods a,sy_goods_common b,sy_org_activity c WHERE a.goods_commonid=b.goods_commonid AND b.goods_activity_id=c.activity_id AND a.goods_id=#{goodsId}
